item.title: FAQ
item.description: Why OpenAPI, not gRPC? It is hard question, and you may find many online documents to compare them. The reason here is mainly author’s personal preference. Why OpenAPI 2.0, not 3.0? Some code generation tools only support OpenAPI 2.0, such as https://goswagger.io. To best utilize these tools, the spec is using 2.0 now.
